notification_data.title: Women's History Month
notification_data.description: The nationwide observance of Women History Month this year uses the themeCelebrating Women Who Tell Our Stories as a tribute to women in every community who have devoted their lives and talents to producing art and news, pursuing truth and reflecting society

notification_data.title: Health Counselling
notification_data.description: The goal of health counseling is to empower people to make informed decisions about their health and take positive steps towards achieving their health-related goals.

notification_data.title: Virtual Job Fair
notification_data.description: Join us for our virtual job fair on April 15th, where you can connect with top employers and learn about exciting job opportunities in various industries.

notification_data.title: Mental Health Awareness Month
notification_data.description: May is Mental Health Awareness Month, a time to raise awareness and reduce stigma around mental health issues. Let's work together to promote mental wellness and support those who are struggling.

notification_data.title: Healthy Eating Challenge
notification_data.description: Join our 30-day healthy eating challenge and learn how to make delicious and nutritious meals that will fuel your body and mind. Get support and motivation from our community of like-minded individuals.

notification_data.title: Financial Planning Webinar
notification_data.description: Are you ready to take control of your finances? Join our free webinar on financial planning and learn how to create a budget, save for the future, and invest wisely.

notification_data.title: Family Fun Day
notification_data.description: Join us for a day of family fun and games at the park! We'll have a bounce house, face painting, and more. Don't miss out on the fun!

notification_data.title: Summer Concert Series
notification_data.description: Get ready for our summer concert series featuring local musicians and bands. Bring your lawn chairs and enjoy the music under the stars!

notification_data.title: Community Clean-Up Day
notification_data.description: Help keep our community beautiful by joining us for our community clean-up day. We'll provide the gloves and trash bags, you provide the enthusiasm!

notification_data.title: Scholarship Applications Open
notification_data.description: Apply now for our annual scholarship program. We offer scholarships in various fields of study to help students achieve their academic goals.

notification_data.title: Guest Lecture on Neuroscience
notification_data.description: Join us for a guest lecture by Dr. Jane Smith on the latest developments in neuroscience. This is a great opportunity to learn from a leading expert in the field.

notification_data.title: Study Abroad Information Session
notification_data.description: Thinking about studying abroad? Join us for an information session to learn about our study abroad programs and how to apply.

notification_data.title: Career Fair
notification_data.description: Connect with top employers and explore career opportunities at our annual career fair. Bring your resume and dress to impress!

notification_data.title: Research Symposium
notification_data.description: Join us for our annual research symposium featuring presentations from our faculty and students. This is a great opportunity to learn about the latest research in various fields.

notification_data.title: New Campus Building Opening
notification_data.description: We are excited to announce the opening of our new state-of-the-art campus building. Come see the new facilities and learn about our programs!

notification_data.title: COVID-19 Safety Update
notification_data.description: As the COVID-19 situation continues to evolve, we are committed to providing a safe and healthy learning environment. Stay updated on our latest safety measures and guidelines.

notification_data.title: Alumni Homecoming Weekend
notification_data.description: Join us for our annual alumni homecoming weekend, where you can reconnect with classmates, attend sporting events, and reminisce about your college days.
